title: Castel Ravello
content:
Error: soubor není platný nebo neexistuje

Castel Ravello is a famous castle in Toussaint, around which are lush vineyards. It is known worldwide as the place of production of the famous wines:

Est Est
Erveluce
Fiorano
Pomino

One day following Saovine, Geralt killed a monster who turn out not to be simply a huge taxidermy display in the cellar of the old castle.
